org.apache.archiva.event

Interface EventSource

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EditableManagedRepository, EditableRemoteRepository, EditableRepository, EditableRepositoryGroup, ManagedRepository, RemoteRepository, Repository, RepositoryGroup, RepositoryRegistry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractManagedRepository, AbstractRemoteRepository, AbstractRepository, AbstractRepositoryGroup, ArchivaRepositoryRegistry, BasicManagedRepository, BasicRemoteRepository, EventManager, MavenManagedRepository, MavenRemoteRepository, MavenRepositoryGroup

    public interface EventSource
    A repository event source raises events to its registered listeners. Listeners register to event types that are structured hierarchical.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      void      		 registerEventHandler(EventType<T> type, EventHandler<? super T> eventHandler) 
      <T extends Event>
